item.title: Report X-2025041670
item.description:
Report X-2025041670

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-24T15:13:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-18
  • City: SYLMAR
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO OF DELAWARE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO A LEAKING HAZMAT AT DOOR 23 IN THE UNLOAD. UPON ARRIVAL LOCATED A CLASS 3 FLAMMABLE LIQUID DIAMOND HAZARD LABEL, OPENED THE DECISION TREE TO THE CORRECT RESPONSE SHEET AND CLEAN UP THE SPILL AS DIRECTED AND TAKE THE HAZMAT TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
